titleStmt.title: Sherlock against Sherlock. The master of the temple's reasons for his late taking the oath to their Majesties, answered, / by the rector of St. George Botolph-Lane. With modest remarks on the doctors celebrated notions of allegiance to soveraign powers.
titleStmt.author: Wagstaffe, Thomas, 1645-1712.

publicationStmt.publisher: and are to be sold by Alexander Henderson ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, dark, print show-through with some loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
